data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. Meanwhile, the broad band of clouds covering southern China will thin out gradually. The weather will improve progressively over the region. It will be dry during the day with daytime temperatures rising. An easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of Guangdong gradually early to midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251025","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
